title: Incorrect column names displayed in expression builder when selecting a dataset with alias set.
description: When setting an alias for columns in a dataset, the expression builder still displays the old column names instead of the assigned aliases when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are shown instead of the assigned aliases.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new datasource and a dataset. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset, e.g. 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. The old column names will be displayed instead of the assigned aliases.
